title: Normal MMR should be the same as Ranked
body:
I'm currently sitting at Plat 3 and kind of struggling being really good at some roles and not so great at other roles (Mid, ADC)
I wish to practice the roles I'm weak at so i Que up for some normal teambuilder.
But i cant practice at all when every single game is a stomp when i am matched with low silver players.
I cant practice in Ranked or else I will lose.
There is just no way to get better unless I spend upwards of 100 games in normals raising my MMR.
I honestly feel myself becoming worse playing with people much lower then me.
Just some thoughts.

replies.body: Well only thing you can is play alot of normals lol. I am Plat III too and in normals I match people from low Gold up to Diamond and even Master from time to time. But that is because I have nearly 2400 normal games.

But if X player doesn't like the mentality of ranked games and only plays normals, he shouldn't be blocked at a low normal MMR. I mean, this would create unbalanced games as well ; if not more unbalanced. And that won't even help him getting better, being good at stomping low elos =/= being good at facing high elos
Why not just use which ever is higher for normals but keep ranked separate?
Thats true. Maybe Riot can do something for high elo players where if the difference between their Ranked and normal MMR is a full 2 tiers they can bump them up a bit?

I cannot upvote the OP enough. I really don't play unranked that much unless it's with a group, or I want to test a new champ. Testing a new champ doesn't mean I should be knocked down multiple divisions past what I face in ranked.

If I wanted a sandbox, I would play against bots.

I wouldn't recommend having normal MMR be based on ranked MMR simply because that would artificially cap players who don't play ranked.

Perhaps it should use the higher of Normal MMR and Ranked MMR when matchmaking?  It's one simple solution, though I'm not sure what the full consequences would be.
This could work.. So if X player has higher normal MMR then ranked you will use that but if you are like me and have much higher ranked MMR it  will use that for normals.
